transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, Ektaaz sir, good morning, Rahul bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bahar gaya sir.
Executive: Bola tha free hoke mujhe call kariye, mujhe call kariye free hoke, aawaz nahi aa rahi aapki.
Customer: Haan karo.
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Koi baat hai boliye na sir.
Executive: Nahi, mai bol raha tha ki ye apna jo aapne pucha tha na kal ki refund ka, to sir process me ho jayega aapka, thik hai?
Customer: Achha achha, ho jayega na?
Executive: Haan, ho jayega. Aur mai puchhna tha apni koi matlab Bengaluru ki local ki koi GST wagera hai apni?
Customer: Haan sir, Bengaluru ka GST hum change karwa lenge, char din ka time bola jise ye kya bolte hai, CO.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: CO, CA bolte hai na usko?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To wo bola ki aap agreement banwa lo yaha ka, to agreement banwa lenge na, to ho jayega din me. Matlab 10-15 din.
Executive: Ek kaam karo waha ka na, agar kisi ka ho to usse karwa lo ya fir apna change karwa lijiye, hai na, koi dusri GST nahi hoti. Matlab ki nahi jayega.
Customer: Haan, dono me se koi karwa lenge.
Executive: Kisi ka ho to bata dijiyega, waha ka GST kar denge na to fir aapke waha ki local ke hi rahegi, thik hai sir?
Customer: Ji ji sir, okay okay, haan, baki isko mai karwa raha, thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai okay sir okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about the refund status.

- Customer asked about changing Bengaluru GST.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund is in process.

- Executive suggested getting GST from someone local.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, gst, local gst
